original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，孟獲部下，善使截頭大刀。孟獲與蜀軍二次對壘時，忙牙長與馬岱對陣，被馬岱斬殺。
text: A fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms", a subordinate of Meng Huo, who is good at truncating the head. When Meng Huo confronted the Shu army for the second time, busy Yachang faced Ma Dai and was beheaded by Ma Dai.
